layer.name: Skill
layer.definition: The ability to do something well; expertise. Not just doing something, but developing competence — getting better through deliberate practice and feedback.

questions.text: I have developed effective learning methods — I know how I learn best and I use that knowledge intentionally.
questions.principle: Learning how to learn is foundational skill

questions.text: I can synthesize information from multiple sources into coherent understanding — not just collect facts, but integrate them.
I have developed critical thinking skills — I can evaluate arguments, spot logical fallacies, and think clearly under pressure.
I can explain complex ideas simply — my understanding is deep enough to translate for others.
I actively work to improve my thinking — I treat my mind as a tool to be sharpened, not just used.
